p: Light green (yield: 50%), m.p.: 212–215 °C,1H NMR [CDCl3, 400 MHz, δ (ppm) with TMS = 0]; 3.07 (1H, dd, J = 4 Hz), 3.98 (1H, t, J 23 = 12 Hz), 5.64 (1H, dd, J = 4 Hz), 6.61 (1H, d, J = 8 Hz), 6.84 (1H, d, J = 8 Hz), 6.93 (1H, t, J = 8 Hz), 7.31 (1H, s), 7.41 (3H, t, J = 4 Hz), 7.50 (2H, d, J = 4 Hz), 7.63 (2H, d, J = 4 Hz), 7.80 (1H, s), 7.92 (1H,d, J = 8 Hz), mass (EI): calculated for C24H16Br2ClN3: 538.94 gm/mol [M]+; found 539, [M+2] peak at 541.
